uvi.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v4.14.240
uvi.description:
memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.240 by commit 7626ffbea708e5aba6912295c012d2b409a1769f, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit a20cbdeffce247a2b6fb83cd8d22433994068565. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure
